q: - The African Union mediator in the Ivory Coast political crisis on Friday called for direct talks between presidential rivals Laurent Gbagbo and Alassane Ouattara . The Kenyan Prime Minister Raila Odinga said an AU summit starting on Sunday should send a strong and unequivocal message that the two parties must negotiate face-to-face. `` Every day lost in moving forward towards a peaceful resolution of the crisis makes more imminent the spectre of further threats to peace and security in Cote d'Ivoire and the region,'' Raila Odinga told reporters in

Eric Schmidt , who last week said he will step down as chief executive officer in favor of Google co-founder Larry Page to become executive chairman, is actually committed to Google, he told reporters at the Digital-Life-Design conference in Munich.`` How long are you committed to doing what you're doing? PM Microsoft has picked an executive with deep engineering and online experience to help build its presence in the nascent cloud computing market. Data Warehouse Appliance Promises Database Transparence, Mixed BI Workload, Massive Scalability Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business.
